mapper.sql: DISTINCT a.id_ AS `id`, a.title_ AS `title`, a.order_ AS `order`, a.parent_id_ AS `parentId`, a.expand_ AS `expand`, a.path_ as `path`, a.name_ as `name`, a.component_ as `component`, a.hide_in_menu_ as `hideInMenu`, a.not_cache_ as `notCache`, a.icon_ as `icon`
LEFT JOIN role_menu_ b ON b.menu_id_ = a.id_ LEFT JOIN role_ c ON c.id_ = b.role_id_ LEFT JOIN role_user_ d ON d.role_id_ = c.id_ LEFT JOIN user_ e ON e.id_ = d.user_id_
mapper.select:
select
from menu_ a
and e.id_ = #{userId}
order by a.order_
